wikipedia_page.main: Brian Mark Chambers (born 31 October 1949) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder. He played in the Football League for Sunderland, Arsenal, Luton Town, Millwall, AFC Bournemouth and Halifax Town, before moving into non-league football.

response: *Brian Chambers (Game Developer) (born 1972), American born Video Game Developer
